channel.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
channel.description:
hello all,
I have an administrator, called john...
Next thing i know...i have a player called john with a space after it...
This player messes up the admins friends list because you pm both of them at same time...
Anyone know how to stop ppl making accounts the same as other players..with just a space at the end??
ALL HELP APPRECIATED!
-- Thanks! --

item.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

LOL!

How dumb cna i get -.-" darn…

anyway, thanks alot mate…for not flaming me :)…and for helping me lol

Read full topic

item.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

No… Do it before checking the password.

Somewhere you’ll see playerName = inStream.readString();. Do it just underneath that.

Read full topic

item.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

I put that before the welcome message…

now if sum1 puts “john” and 2 spaces. and any password. it deletes the admin acc and trims john two spaces down to just john. creating a new account.

so that ddint work?

so i need sumet like if password is correct then playername = playername.trim(); ???

Read full topic

item.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

You can trim whitespace characters from the start/end of the name. Just do something like this in your login procedure where it gets the player name:

playerName = playerName.trim();

Read full topic

item.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

But if i make it so they cant have spaces in the name then they cant have something like “pker pure” can they???

also how do i do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Account Name Problem... help plz?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

You have to make it so you can’t make accounts with illegal characters like… _+@’~#{}[]

Read full topic
